product_name: FalconGuides Best Easy Day Hikes: Denver - 2nd Edition
long_description: The updated Best Easy Day Hikes: Denver features concise descriptions and easy-to-follow maps for 19 short hikes in the foothills of the Front Range near Denver, Colorado.
short_description: The updated Best Easy Day Hikes: Denver features concise descriptions and easy-to-follow maps for 19 short hikes in the foothills of the Front Range near Denver, Colorado.
